RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 18000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD OR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming races for $10,000 o r less not considered in eligibility and allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME SUNDAY set the pace on the inside and drew out on the turn, then was kept to right handed crop pressure to prove much the best. RUNNERS HEAT tracked the winner and advanced three wide on the turn, finished willingly while no match to the winner and clearly second best. SHADOW BELLE threw head at the start and off slowly, outrun early, came five wide into the lane and had some late kick to gain the show award. LOONA LUV was settled early and had no rally. MY LADY SLEW showed some early speed and tracked the winner two wide on the turn and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Loona Luv
ENTRY.OWNER: Clabar Mor Stables LLC and Haran Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: My Lady Slew
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, 2 wide turn, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Shadow Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: threw head start, came 5 wide upper stretch, late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Sunday
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, drew off turn, kept to pressure

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Amy E. Dunne & Ciaran G. Dunne

ENTRY.NAME: Runners Heat
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 2 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since June 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250 (Claiming races for $4,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOOK AWAY checked early then was reserved early in hand, advanced two to three wide on the turn, came five wide into the lane and closed full of run to win going away late, driving. MISTER CHARMING stalked the early pace, made a three wide bid on the turn and between rivals to vie for command, then gained a short lead by the furlong marker but could not go with the winner late, held place award. KRAMDEN was allowed to settle on the inside, two wide on the turn, angled out in the furlong grounds and finished willingly. POWERFUL MAN tracked the early pace, shifted out entering the backstretch, made a four wide move on the turn to vie for command, but flattened out the final furlong. OPTION was three wide into the first turn, vied for the lead three wide, made a two wide bid on the turn to vie for the lead on the inside of a trio but weakened the final furlong. MITZRAYIM was sent to the front and crossed over to the inside, vied for the lead and stopped on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Powerful Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, shift out, bid 4 wide, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Mister Charming
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 3 wide between horses, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Look Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked early, reserved, came 5 wide, closed, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Kramden
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, 2 wide turn, angled out, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Option
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3 wide first turn, vied 3 wide, bid 2 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Mitzrayim
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to lead, vied for lead inside, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 85. Maiden Special Weight Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PENUMBRAS MAKER broke in at the start, then pulled inside to track the pace, eased out and came three wide into the lane to make a bid, long drive and got up late on the left lead to prevail. SPICY ITALIAN set the pace while uncontested on the inside, dug in gamely in the drive and was denied on the wire losing the head bob. LIL CARRIE D was brushed at the start, then was rated along two wide, inside entering the drive and lacked the needed winning bid, bested rest. WILDWOOD ENOUGH stalked the pace three wide and weakened. JOYZELLA was four wide into the first turn, settled, then was two wide on the far turn and lacked a rally. THEMISCHIEVOUSONE chased the pace three wide and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Penumbras Maker
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in start, tracked inside, came 3 wide, bid, left lead, up

ENTRY.NAME: Spicy Italian
ENTRY.COMMENT: set unchallenged pace inside, dug in stretch, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Themischievousone
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Carrie D
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed start, rated 2 wide, inside 1/4 pole, needed bid

ENTRY.NAME: Wildwood Enough
ENTRY.OWNER: Ritter Charles W and Becker Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Joyzella
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, settled, 2 wide turn, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 14500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250 (Claiming races for $4,000 or less not considered in esti mating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GETTIN DOWN was away alertly and soon clear to set the pace, raced in the two path on the turn and then cut the corner leaving the turn and widened the advantage by the furlong marker and then was kept to mild crop pressure to prove best. SEQUAYA was reserved early, three wide on the turn, angled out in the lane and finished well on the outside, second best. HEY MA chased the winner on the inside and lacked the needed winning bid, held show award. OPALINE chased the pace two to three wide and had no rally, even effort. LUNARCHY was bumped at the start, settled early, came four wide into the lane and had no rally. BELLS OF JOY was reserved early and failed to respond. SHINY SHOES was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Ma
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner inside, needed bid, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Shiny Shoes
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Opaline
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 2-3 wide turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Bells of Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Lunarchy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, settled, came 4 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Gettin Down
ENTRY.OWNER: Patricia's Hope LLC and Down The Stretch Racing Stables Inc (Larry Rivelli)
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, soon clear, widened 1/8, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Sequaya
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, 3 wide turn, angled out, rallied

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 5 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 39000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since June 16 Al lowed 2 lbs. (Claiming races for $20,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility). In the event that this race is taken off the turf it will be contested at One Mile and Seventy Yards on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COALMINER'S KITTEN was well rated behind the pace on the inside, eased off the inside on the turn and came four wide into the drive, closed well to get up late to prove best, driving. SIMPLE LOGIC was three wide into the first turn, vied for the lead three wide and in between rivals, made a three wide bid on the turn to draw clear, then remained clear by the furlong marker but was caught late. RUSSIAN HAMMER was allowed to settle, in contention on the turn, blocked by the quarter pole, then found room by the three sixteenths and finished well on the inside. BAKENEKO was four wide into the first turn, prompted the pace four wide and came five wide into the lane and weakened. SHARP AZ NAILS vied for the lead in between rivals and tired. MAN ON ATTACK hit the gate coming out at the start, then rushed up the inside to vie for command on the first turn, tired on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Sharp Az Nails
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead between horses, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Simple Logic
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3 wide first turn, vied between 3 wide, bid turn, clear, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Man On Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate start, rushed inside, vied inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Coalminer's Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated inside, eased out turn, came 4 wide, closed, up late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

ENTRY.NAME: Bakeneko
ENTRY.OWNER: Donovitch Kevin W Rodriguez Eduardo M and Joy Kyle S
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide 2 wide, prompted outside, came 5 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Russian Hammer
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, blocked 1/4, finished well inside,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 16 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES IN 2022 - 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since Ju ne 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming races for $4,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PALACE MAGIC was well placed early between rivals up on the pace, rated off the leaders on the turn two wide, then made a bid leaving the furlong marker and split rivals to duel for command late and prevailed late, driving. HER GOLD MINE vied for the early lead on the outside, then made a bid leaving the furlong marker and dueled late but just missed. AUNT STELLA chased the pace three wide on the turn, came five wide into the laner and rallied but needed more late. ARCH FLYER vied for the lead on the inside and made a bid to shake clear off the turn but faded late. AH LEAH tracked the pace on the inside and had no late kick. RANK AND FILE was settled on the inside and swung out three wide leaving the turn and had no rally. CAIRO SUMMER was shifted out shortly after the start, raced wide and had no rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Ah Leah
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, saved ground turn, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Cairo Summer
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, wide turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Rank and File
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, swung 3 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Stella
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3 wide, came 5 wide, rallied, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Arch Flyer
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, bid inside, shook clear, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed between, 2 wide turn, split rivals, dueled, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Her Gold Mine
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied outside, bid 4 wide, dueled, missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,500 (Claiming races for $6,250 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MEDAL OF FACT was settled early, three wide on the turn, then closed well to hit the front late and edged clear, driving. MALIGATOR was off slowly, settled in the back, came widest into the lane, then closed the gap fast late to gain the place award and gaining on the winner. MUD ISLAND stalked the pace four wide, made a five wide bid off the turn to gain a short lead but was not enough and lost the place award on the wire. RISKY BOY was bumped st the start, settled, three to four wide on the turn and finished well. KENNESAW was allowed to settle on the inside and needed more. GREELEYS ICE tracked the pace and made a inside bid off the turn to vie for command by the furlong marker but flattened out. CHOPPER was bumped at the start, then set the pace while clear, two wide on the turn and three wide into the lane, weakened the final furlong while drifting out. FOLLOW THE SIGNS broke out and bumped a foe at the start, then checked between rivals leaving the five eighths marker, settled in the back, came five wide into the lane and was rallying but checked by the sixteenth marker when the early leader drifted out in his path, tough trip. D'ARCHER was settled early, two wide on the turn and was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Kennesaw
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, saved ground, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: D'archer
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 2 wide turn, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Follow the Signs
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out bumped foe start, checked 5/8, checked 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Risky Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, settled, 4 wide turn, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Chopper
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, s unchallenged pace, drifted out stretch, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Medal of Fact
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide turn, closed, edged clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Greeleys Ice
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, bid inside, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Maligator
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, settled back, came wide upper stretch, closed gap,

ENTRY.NAME: Mud Island
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 5 wide, lost 2nd late
